## TinySynqOptionsBase.sqlite3 property

A BetterSqlite3 instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript
sqlite3?: SQLiteWASM;
```

## Remarks

If not provided, [TinySynqOptionsBase.filePath](./tinysynq-web.tinysynqoptionsbase.filepath.md) must be set.
